program.name: vibe
program.description: ğŸš€ Vibe Dev CLI - GitHub Copilot Chat integration for maximum coding productivity

init.title: ğŸ¤– Vibe CLI AI Agent Integrated Learning Instructions
init.template:
ğŸš€ Vibe CLI AI Agent Integrated Learning Instructions

ğŸ¯ Purpose:
Automatically save all interactions during development to accumulate knowledge and maximize development productivity through integration with Linear/Jira and other tools

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ“ Auto-save Rules:
1. Whenever user asks important technical questions
2. Whenever providing code modifications or new feature implementations
3. Whenever suggesting problem solutions
4. Whenever making architectural or design decisions
5. Whenever working on Linear/Jira issues
6. Whenever resolving build/deployment issues

âš ï¸ CRITICAL RULE: After completing each user question, you MUST register the work content in sessions.json!
- Use `vibe copilot edit` command to save conversation content after every completed question
- Update session immediately after work completion to prevent knowledge loss
- Save each Q&A individually even for consecutive questions
- Update session immediately upon code changes, problem resolution, or explanation completion

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ› ï¸ VIBE CLI Tool Usage:

ğŸ¤– COPILOT Session Management:
```bash
# Create new session (initial setup)
vibe copilot save -n "project-feature" -t "development,linear" -c "Development session started" --project-type "CLI Tool" --tech-stack "TypeScript,Commander.js"

# Add conversation content (REQUIRED after every question completion!)
vibe copilot edit "session-name" --append-conversation "Q: [User question]\n\nA: [AI answer and solution]\n\nResult: [Application result]\n\nLearning: [Learned patterns/principles]"

# Check session list
vibe copilot list

# Load previous session (copied to clipboard)
vibe copilot load [session-name]

# Edit session
vibe copilot edit "session-name" --add-tags "new-tag1,new-tag2" --add-patterns "new-pattern1;new-pattern2"

# Show session details
vibe copilot show "session-name"

# Delete session
vibe copilot delete "session-name"
```

ğŸ”— LINEAR Integration:
```bash
# Linear setup
vibe linear config set-token <token>
vibe linear config teams  # List teams
vibe linear config set-team <team-id>
vibe linear config projects  # List projects
vibe linear config set-project <project-id>
vibe linear config get  # Check current settings

# Workspace initialization (interactive)
vibe linear config init

# Issue management
vibe linear issue list --limit 20  # List issues
vibe linear issue create --title "title" --description "description"

# Output issue information for AI visibility
vibe linear copilot <issue-id>
```

ğŸ« JIRA Integration (Coming Soon):
```bash
# Jira setup (planned)
vibe jira config set-token <token>
vibe jira config set-domain <domain>

# Issue management (planned)
vibe jira issue list
vibe jira issue create --title "title" --description "description"
vibe jira copilot <issue-key>
```

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ“Š Information Structure to Save (REQUIRED for every question!):
- Question: Specific question asked by user
- Answer: Provided solution and code changes
- Result: Problem resolved after application
- Learning: Patterns or principles learned from this process
- Tool Integration: Connection with Linear/Jira issues

ğŸ·ï¸ Tag Classification System:
- By Technology: typescript, commander, chalk, linear-api, jira-api
- By Work Type: restructure, session-management, es-modules, issue-tracking
- By Problem: build-error, import-issue, command-structure, api-integration
- By Tool: linear, jira, copilot, git

ğŸ”„ Workflow Automation (for every question):
1. Start issue work: `vibe linear copilot <issue-id>` â†’ Check issue information
2. After completing user question response: Immediately save Q&A to session
3. Work completion: Organize entire process as session for future similar work

ğŸ’¡ Actual Usage Example (save at every step):
1. Check Linear issue: `vibe linear copilot ABC-123`
2. Start development session: `vibe copilot save -n "ABC-123-feature" -t "linear,feature"`
3. After question 1 completion: `vibe copilot edit "ABC-123-feature" --append-conversation "Q: [question1]\nA: [answer1]\nResult: [result1]"`
4. After question 2 completion: `vibe copilot edit "ABC-123-feature" --append-conversation "Q: [question2]\nA: [answer2]\nResult: [result2]"`
5. Use in other projects: `vibe copilot load ABC-123-feature`

ï¿½ CORE PRINCIPLE: Never forget!
- When user's question is completed â†’ Immediately save to sessions.json
- Even for consecutive questions â†’ Save each individually
- When code changes are completed â†’ Update session right away
- When problems are resolved â†’ Record learning content immediately

ï¿½ğŸš€ Important: Please automatically save all important conversations to sessions from now on!

tips: ğŸ’¡ Tip: Request 'Update session' during conversation to save the latest content.
